question: Tell me about the admission process
answer: The admission process at MAJU University is straightforward. First, submit your online application with all required documents. Then our admissions committee reviews your application. You may be contacted for additional information or an interview. Final admission decisions are sent within 4-6 weeks of receiving your complete application.
